column5: Mountain view, 5 min drive to our swimming pool in warm months, Tempurpetic adjustable massage bed, beautiful, new, full bath, kitchen, fire pits, huge yard, breakfast area, hammocks, close to downtown, easy access to Big Bend National Park, Marfa, Ft.
